definitions.820-3437: What is 820-3437? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> black screen with dong
threads.message:
hi,
my problem is screen issue with this board, backlight but no picture on screen.
I remove all device (ssd, airport, etc...) same problem.
I reflash the Bios with me clean after save the original, and it work.
Now what can i do?
thanks

ps: the original bios [url]https://www.dropbox.com/s/e60qv9otp92oxqt/01.BIN?dl=0[/url]

threads.message: do you get the picture via a external monitor without internal display connected?
